Perseverance & Grit: Persists through challenging goals and tasks until the end
Embraces occasional failure as an inevitability of growth
Curiosity & Personal Principles: Strives to constantly learn and improve
High personal standards and perfectionist by nature
Problem Solving: Strives to intelligently predict potential issues and practice preventative measures
Personal Organization: Practices neat and tidy organizational systems in both professional and personal life
Embraces planning and outlining as an important first step to any project
Communication & Teamwork: Personable, clear, and candid communication style
Primarily independent worker, comfortable with collaboration
